To clear things up:
It really contains a 700mb ISO.

BUT: it's a maxi-iso.

It contains no real data, only a few bytes needed to trick the game into thinking the real cd is in the drive.

!!! Football Manager 2007 Maxi-Image !!!

NOT the real game.

If you don't know what this means: use Google!
Maxi ISO ! Its not BS ! Thanks !
